stories.text:
Every day we move with promises... A promise to give your employer the best from you. A Promise to make your customers happy. A Promise to look after your parents. A Promise to protect your family. A Promise to give the best for your children.

But sometimes...in between all those promises to others... We forget about ourselves. We forget about the only asset, we have in this physical world - "Our Body".

Do Hacker News Community Care about your health, while building something? Do you do regular exercises, health check ups, eat good food rather than junk etc to keep yourself healthy?
stories.title: Ask HN: Do Hacker News Community Care about your own health?
